snippet: Weeks after a Malaysian jetliner disappeared, Europe’s aviation safety agency proposed measures to improve the chances of finding flight recorders.
abstract: European Aviation Safety Agency, nearly two months after Malaysian jetliner disappeared, formally proposes measures aimed at improving chances of finding flight recorders of aircraft that crash at sea.
lead_paragraph: Weeks after a Malaysian jetliner disappeared, Europe’s aviation safety agency proposed measures to improve the chances of finding flight recorders.

headline.main: Europe Seeks Tougher Rules on Aircraft Recorders
headline.print_headline: Europe Seeks Stricter Rules for Aircraft Flight Recorders
